description: ğŸ”¥ Trailverse - Your Universe of Trail Adventures. Advanced National Parks Explorer with AI, AR, and Real-time Features

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:shared && npm run test:client -- --coverage && npm run test:server -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:shared -- --fix && npm run lint:client -- --fix && npm run lint:server -- --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:shared && npm run type-check:client && npm run type-check:server
scripts.setup:workspaces: npm run setup:shared && npm run setup:client && npm run setup:server
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:builds
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules shared/node_modules mobile/node_modules
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run setup:workspaces
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

author: Trailverse Team <dev@trailverse.app>
